description: This treat combines the robust, rich flavors of freshly brewed espresso with the creamy, velvety texture of vanilla ice cream, creating a harmonious symphony of hot and cold sensations.

instructions: Prepare the hot coffee blend. Prepare 1 cup of strong espresso coffee using your preferred method. While the coffee is still very hot, add 1 tablespoon of sugar to the coffee and stir well to dissolve the sugar. Once the sugar is dissolved, pour in 1 cup of good whiskey. Stir again to combine. Prepare the ice cream by placing one or two scoops of coffee or vanilla ice cream in each serving glass. Carefully pour the hot coffee and whiskey mixture over the ice cream in each glass. Garnish with grated chocolate, coffee granules, or whipped cream if desired. Serve immediately.
